title: Mobile-Based Technical Communication Intensive Short Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device proficiency and basic document creation skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-centric learning environment, formative assessment integration, and asynchronous learning module design

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core structure of technical documents (purpose, audience, procedure) in three steps or fewer
Learners can restructure complex technical information into concise sentences of three sentences or fewer
Learners can collaborate with team members in mobile environments to submit technical problem-solving solutions within 24 hours

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
